name: Saturo VS Desaturo
description:
Be the first to score 1000 points ! Players battle in a battleground, where they shoot at flags to conquer them. Each flag periodically gives points to player that owns it.
Ocassionaly a power spawns, pick it up to recieve movement speed boost !

Players cannot destroy / kill / each other.

Controls:
Player 1 (Saturo) :
      Movement - Arrow keys
      Shooting - Num Pad 0

Player 2 (Desaturo) :

      Movement - WASD
      Shooting - F
